name: 贝德·布莱克
introduction: Bede Blake is an established writer and producer of drama and comedy. Best known as the creator of BBC's subversive teen comedy Shelfstackers (2010), as the creative force behind Evermoor (2014) for Disney, and most recently as co-creator of Netflix's BAFTA Award-winning anthology series Creeped Out (2017). Blake's work has won or been nominated for a BAFTA Award, an International Emmy, Writers Guild of Great Britain Award, British Screenwriters Award, Kidscreen Award, and the Royal Television Society Award.
